subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Fred Hoiberg is back home coaching at Iowa State after 15 years in the N.B.A. as a player and executive, but his dream job comes with risks.
snippet: Fred Hoiberg is back home coaching at Iowa State after 15 years in the N.B.A. as a player and executive, but his dream job comes with risks.
